name: Shipblasters! (Super Alpha)
description:
Ever wanted to BLAST SHIPS?  Well now you can!

A fast-paced top-down strategy game where you dodge, shoot and shield other Enemies to survive!

Controls:-

WASD - move

SPACE - dash

E - shield

C - Customizer Screen (In game)

ESC - Main Menu (In game)

NOTE: THIS GAME IS IN ALPHA SO NOT EVERYTHING WILL BE COMPLETE AND THERE WILL BE MANY BUGS (CONSTRUCTIVE CRITISICM IS ACCEPTED)

also the html version may not work
